title: IVR Call Menu & Customer Experience Optimization
tagline: Intelligent call routing that reduced wait times by 35%

context.problem: Peak season call volume overwhelmed staff with long wait times, high transfer rates, and inconsistent inquiry handling leading to poor customer experiences.
context.quote: Customers were hanging up before we could help them. We needed smarter routing.

solution.approach: Designed multi-level IVR system with intelligent routing based on customer intent, branded voice prompts, CRM integration, and after-hours handling.
bullets: Analyzed call logs and categorized inquiry types
Designed intuitive IVR tree for service, retail, billing, installations
Recorded branded voice prompts for consistency
Integrated with Jobber CRM and voicemail management

process.title: Call Analysis
process.description: Analyze seasonal logs and categorize inquiry types

process.title: IVR Design
process.description: Map routing tree based on customer intent

process.title: Staff Training
process.description: Train team on new routing and workflows

process.title: Continuous Optimization
process.description: Monitor metrics and refine routing logic

reflection.learning: Good IVR design feels invisible. Route by intent, not just department, and always offer an escape hatch.
